arguments.description: Optional list of modules to include in the report.
arguments.name: modules

description: Generate an LCOV report of coverage results.

options.description: Read coverage data for report generation from this file. Defaults to '.coverage'. [env: COVERAGE_FILE]
options.name: --data-file

options.description: Exit with a status of 2 if the total coverage is less than MIN.
options.name: --fail-under

options.description: Ignore errors while reading source files.
options.name: --ignore-errors

options.description: Include only files whose paths match one of these patterns. Accepts shell-style wildcards, which must be quoted.
options.name: --include

options.description: Omit files whose paths match one of these patterns. Accepts shell-style wildcards, which must be quoted.
options.name: --omit

options.description: Don't print messages about what is happening.
options.name: --quiet

options.description: Debug options, separated by commas. [env: COVERAGE_DEBUG]
options.name: --debug

options.description: Specify configuration file. By default '.coveragerc', 'setup.cfg', 'tox.ini', and 'pyproject.toml' are tried. [env: COVERAGE_RCFILE]
options.name: --rcfile
